mapper.select: select c.id id,c.name name,c.type_type typeType,c.parent_id parentId,c.type_sell typeSell,c.created_time createdTime ,p.name parentName from t_type c left join t_type p on c.parent_id=p.id
mapper.delete: update t_type set name=#{name},type_type=#{typeType},parent_id=#{parentId},type_sell=#{typeSell},modified_user=#{modifiedUser}, modified_time=now() where id=#{id}
